tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is really friendly and takes utmost care in treating the patient. She ensures the patient is well informed at every step and treats with maximum care. Attention to detail and thorough care is highly appreciated. Thanks to Dr. Priyadarshini for being flexible too at times.
reply_text: Thank you so much sir, for taking your valuable time to review and recommend us!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have been to many dentists but Dr Priya is friendly, down to earth & connects with patients well. She hears past history & recommends **** ** *** **** ********* **** ****** ********** She charges affordable fees.  Clinic is clean & i will recommend this dr.

tags: None
review: It's my first time consulting an Dentist, I was bit afraid to be frank as I'm having Diabetes and people around me used to say don't go to dentist as it will result in gum problems. But the way she handled me is very kind and also cost is very effective. Surely I would recommend her for anyone who is searching *** ** **** ********
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable feedback and appreciation Mr. Sivaramakrishnan.
